message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You started high, I'll start low!
You went high, I'll meet you in the middle!
Getting closer, but still too low!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
Getting down to the wire, time to make a serious offer!
I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give up too much!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
I'm making one last push, let's see if we can meet in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to give in now!
I'm making a final stand, let's see if we can find a compromise!
